name: Roast Beef Sliders
author: thedailygourmet
summary: A handful of ingredients is all it takes to have a fast appetizer ready for game day.
ingredients: 1 pound thinly sliced deli roast beef
1 (8 ounce) package thinly sliced provolone cheese
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray
Slice the rolls in half vertically, leaving each roll attached as a sheet
Peel off the top layer and set aside; place the bottoms of the rolls in the prepared dish
Layer roast beef and cheese across the rolls
Heat oil in a a small skillet over medium-high heat
Cook onion, bell pepper, and mushrooms until soft, about 5 minutes
Spread pepper mixture over cheese and beef
Place the tops of the rolls back on
Mix melted butter, garlic powder, adobo seasoning, and Italian seasoning together
Brush seasoned butter on the tops of the rolls, pouring any extra over the sides
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese starts to melt, about 15 minutes
Separate each roll into a sandwich using a serrated knife
